name: Rat Tunnels
description:
It is a clone of the Tunneler DOS game. It was made to an "one game a month" jam with the keyword of "rat". 

This is a split screen digging and shooting game, the goal is the kill the other player 3 times. Watch out for your energy level because you explode if you run out of it!

It was made using my own very basic 2d game engine, based on SDL2.

Source code is available here: https://github.com/HadaHector/Handy2D
